structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The civil service commission shall examine all eligible applicants as to their physical and mental qualification for the particular classification wherein they seek employment. To be eligible for examination a person must satisfy the minimum standards established under KRS 67A.240.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 5, effective June 21, 1974.
